citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00 PM on
25-Jul-17.
Spoke with the daughter of the licensee. The licensee was away for an emergency.
